overview: Unable to cope with the fact that his girlfriend cheated on him with his best friend, a 22-year-old schizophrenic sets an elaborate revenge plan into motion before taking his own life.

production_companies.name: Fondo de Inversión y Estímulos al Cine (FIDECINE)

tagline: A schizophrenic man commits suicide after his girlfriend cheats on him with his best friend.
title: The Night Buffalo
